description: Personal messages, notifications, and incoming tasks are visible through the Desktop App on your computer. The Desktop App provides users with access to video conferencing for groups up to 4 people and allows making web phone calls directly from Bitrix24. It also features Bitrix24.Drive - a powerful tool to manage and sync files between your Mac/PC and your Bitrix24 in the Cloud.
